1: <mistake>dang//phung</mistake> khams skye mched <mistake>rigs</mistake> drug <mistake>rnams//dag</mistake> <mistake>pba</mistake> 'jig rten khams la <mistake>sogs//le</mistake> <mistake>'</mistake> lnga yi gzhung rnams <mistake>kyis//bden</mistake> gnyis dang <mistake>po'i</mistake> sangs rgyas <mistake>'gyur // dus</mistake> kyi 'khor lo mngon <mistake>brjo/</mistake>
2: <mistake>byed//dang</mistake> por dbang bskur bdun po <mistake>gang//byis</mistake> pa rnams ni gzhug pa'i <mistake>phyir//rnam</mistake> gsum 'jig rten kun rdzob <mistake>kyis//dam</mistake> pa'i don gyis bzhi <mistake>pa'o//bden</mistake> pa gnyis kyi chos rnams <mistake>kyi/</mistake>
3: rdo rje can bdag gis bstan <mistake>pa//'jig</mistake> rten kun rdzob bden pa <mistake>dang//dama</mistake> pa'i don gyi bden pas <mistake>so//chu</mistake> dang cod pan dar dpyangs <mistake>dang //rdo</mistake> rje dril bu brtul zhugs <mistake>che//ming</mistake> dang rjes gnang yang
4: dag ldan // dbang bskur rnam bdun mi <mistake>yi</mistake> <mistake>bdag//lus</mistake> ngag sems ni legs dag <mistake>pa//mgon</mistake> par dbang <mistake>bskur</mistake> gnyis gnyis <mistake>so//rjes</mistake> gnang ye shes yang dag <mistake>dag /gzhan</mistake> pa khams <mistake>sogs</mistake>
5: dag pa <mistake>las//chu</mistake> ni khams kyi dag pa <mistake>ste//cod</mistake> pan phung po rnam sbyong <mistake>byed //dar</mistake> dpyangs <mistake>pharl</mistake> phyin <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>dag /rdo</mistake> rje dril bu mi 'gyur <mistake>tshe//sangs</mistake> rgyas <mistake>skang</mistake> rgyun mi 'chad <mistake>pa// nyi</mistake> zla gcig tu dag
6: par <mistake>byed//yul</mistake> dang dbang po <mistake>legs</mistake> dag <mistake>pa// 'pho</mistake> med rdo <mistake>rje'i</mistake> <mistake>btul</mistake> <mistake>khugs</mistake> <mistake>'gyur //minr</mistake> ni byams sogs yang dag <mistake>dag/rjes</mistake> gnang sangs rgyas nyid dag <mistake>byed/ dbang</mistake> bskur bdun po
7: 'di rnams ni // dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas sbyin <mistake>par</mistake> <mistake>bya//bum</mistake> pa gsang ba'i dbang <mistake>bskyur</mistake> <mistake>dang/ /shes</mistake> rab ye shes mngon brjod <mistake>pa//slar</mistake> yang shes rab chen po <mistake>nyid//de</mistake> yi ye shes mngon
8: <mistake>rjod</mistake> <mistake>byed//'gyur</mistake> dang 'gyur dang de nas <mistake>'dzag // de</mistake> nas gzhan yang mi 'dzag <mistake>pa'o//lus</mistake> <mistake>dag</mistake> sems ni legs dag <mistake>pas//dbang</mistake> bskur gsum po rim pa <mistake>yis//bzhi</mistake> pa ye shes yang dag
